title: PipelineServiceClientConfiguration
description: This schema defines the Pipeline Service Client Configuration

enabled.description: Flags if the ingestion from the MetaMart UI is enabled. If ingesting externally, we can set this value to false to not check the Pipeline Service Client component health.

className.description: Class Name for the Pipeline Service Client.

apiEndpoint.description: External API root to interact with the Pipeline Service Client

hostIp.description: Pipeline Service Client host IP that will be used to connect to the sources.

healthCheckInterval.description: Interval in seconds that the server will use to check the /status of the pipelineServiceClient and flag any errors in a Prometheus metric `pipelineServiceClientStatus.counter`.

ingestionIpInfoEnabled.description: Enable or disable the API that fetches the public IP running the ingestion process.

verifySSL.description: Client SSL verification policy when connecting to the MetaMart server: no-ssl, ignore, validate.

sslConfig.description: MetaMart Client SSL configuration. This SSL information is about the MetaMart server. It will be picked up from the pipelineServiceClient to use/ignore SSL when connecting to the MetaMart server.

authProvider.description: Auth Provider with which MetaMart service configured with.

parameters.description: Additional parameters to initialize the PipelineServiceClient.
